fact.extraction.singlePulse

Class PulseMaxAmplitude

  • java.lang.Object
    • fact.extraction.singlePulse.PulseMaxAmplitude
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    stream.Processor

    public class PulseMaxAmplitude
extends Object
implements stream.Processor
    This processor calculates the position of the maximum value for each pulse in each pixel. Input and output are both arrays of size N_PIXELS with lists of positions for each pixel.

    modified by Katie Gray (kathryn.gray@tu-dortmund.de) from MaxAmplitudePosition

      • findMaximumPositions

        public int[] findMaximumPositions(int pix,
                                  int roi,
                                  double[] data,
                                  int[][] pulsePositions)
        finds the position of the highest value in the pulse. if max is not unique, last position will be taken.
        Parameters:
        pix - Pixel to check
        roi - Basically the number of slices in one event
        data - the array which to check
        Returns:
